messages.subject: Re: NC Connection
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/23/2000 12:23:59 PM Pacific Standard Time, talarr@mindspring.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/23/2000 12:23:59 PM Pacific Standard Time,
talarr@... writes:

<< I'm in Cary, Jenny--I know another Jennifer who's unschooling in the east
Raleigh area, unless you're she! She's wonderful, by the way, and I didn't
know she went by Jenny, so you're probably not the same person...
If you're another Jenny, is Cary too far away? :) >>
Carolyn,
Heavens no, Cary is not far away at all. I live between Clayton and
Wendell and we come to Raleigh about once a week for soccer and church. Love
to talk more particulars -- is it appropriate to do it here or should we
continue "off-list" ?
Jenny in NC
